thread.section_title: Milanoo 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Milanoo 的点评意见 | www.milanoo.com
thread.title: beeccy

author: beeccy
title: beeccy
text: The winter coat I ordered was exactly as in the photo, though thinner and "bigger" than I expected. Too bad it's too thin for Norwegian winters so I'll have to wait till the beginning of Spring. I followed the size table and I ordered on purpose a size smaller due to my bust size. Glad I did, since it fits me better. It's mostly sewn nicely though a few places there was thread hanging out. Shipping was as expected and took about 2 weeks.
